org.magicdgs.readtools.utils.read.writer

Class SplitGATKWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.magicdgs.readtools.utils.read.writer.SplitGATKWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, org.broadinstitute.hellbender.utils.read.GATKReadWriter

    public final class SplitGATKWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.broadinstitute.hellbender.utils.read.GATKReadWriter
    Read writer to add readers splitting by different parameters. This class have a lot of code in common with SplitReads.

      This is different from the GATK4 framework.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SplitGATKWriter

        public SplitGATKWriter(java.lang.String outputPrefix,
                       ReadToolsIOFormat format,
                       java.util.List<org.broadinstitute.hellbender.tools.readersplitters.ReaderSplitter<?>> splitters,
                       htsjdk.samtools.SAMFileHeader header,
                       boolean presorted,
                       ReadWriterFactory factory,
                       boolean onDemand)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        outputPrefix - common output prefix for all the output files.
        format - output extension for the writers. Note that some extensions will not be allowed.
        splitters - ordered list with the splitters to use, one after the other.
        header - output header for all the readers.
        presorted - if true, reads are expected to be already sorted.
        factory - factory to create the writers.
        onDemand - if true, creates the readers on demand; otherwise, all the writers will be generated except the unknown.
